events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their car at an intersection, requesting to file a claim for damages.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the description of the vehicle collision provided.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the customer's case to ensure swift processing and support.
The insurer acknowledged receipt of the auto accident claim and confirmed that the investigation would begin shortly.
The customer was asked to submit the police report, vehicle repair estimates, and photos of the accident scene.
The customer provided all requested documents including the police report and mechanic’s repair estimate promptly.
The claims investigator began reviewing the submitted documents and details related to the vehicle accident.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the customer's vehicle damages were consistent with the reported collision.
A settlement offer was proposed covering the full repair cost of the vehicle as per the estimates provided.
The customer accepted the settlement terms and expressed satisfaction with the timely handling of their claim.
The claim was formally approved following the customer’s acceptance of the settlement offer and verification of documents.
Payment for the approved claim amount was processed and transferred to the customer's bank account promptly.
The claim was officially closed after confirming receipt of payment and customer satisfaction with the resolution.
All records and correspondence related to the completed auto accident claim were archived for future reference.
